page.title: 01GENERAL
page.content: Holsworthy is in the north-west of the County of Devon and about 5 miles from the coast.The area is served by a good road system.The North Cornwall coast can be reached by car in 15 mins,The North Devon coast in 30 mins. Dartmoor and Bodmin moor are half an hours journey.Plymouth is 35 miles from Holsworthy,Exeter 42 miles and London 214 miles. The local Government of the area is administered by the Torridge District Council based in Bideford but there is an Area Office in Holsworthy. Holsworthy and District is represented by 7 councillors on the Torridge District Council. Holsworthy with its weekly two day market and its shops is a busy country market town.Visitors and residents alike are assured of good services and shopping and social amenities.
